about_the_game:
Unleash the devastating fury of Century’s fourth rider class by gaining access to the Stormraiser bolstered with an exclusive set of rewards.

The Stormraiser Starter Pack includes the following:
  • “Stormraiser” Character Class (Rider + Dragon)
  • Epic Dragon, Stormraiser Class
  • Legendary Weapon, Stormraiser Class
  • Legendary Background
  • 14-Day XP Boost
detailed_description:
Unleash the devastating fury of Century’s fourth rider class by gaining access to the Stormraiser bolstered with an exclusive set of rewards.

The Stormraiser Starter Pack includes the following:
  • “Stormraiser” Character Class (Rider + Dragon)
  • Epic Dragon, Stormraiser Class
  • Legendary Weapon, Stormraiser Class
  • Legendary Background
  • 14-Day XP Boost
legal_notice: © 2023 Playwing Ltd. All rights reserved. Century: Age of Ashes, Playwing and the Playwing logo are trademarks of Playwing Ltd. in the U.S. and/or other countries.
name: Century - Stormraiser Starter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.6Ghz or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 760 or AMD RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 2.8Ghz or AMD Ryzen 5 3.2Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Unleash the devastating fury of Century’s fourth rider class by gaining access to the Stormraiser bolstered with an exclusive set of rewards.
supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, French, Japanese
